title: Ian Blackford – 2022 Comments on the State of the Government
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ian Blackford, the SNP leader in Westminster, on Twitter on 19 October 2022.
content: Liz Truss needs to go – and she needs to go now.
This utter chaos can’t continue any longer. If she had an ounce of decency, or any self-respect, she’d put her resignation in before she’s inevitably forced from office.
